attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the preposterous claims of expenses for personal use by Julie Kirkbride, I ask the prime minister to rid us of this person porporting to be our MP.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
